word: PRAYER FOR THE SICK IS AS EFFECTIVE TODAY AS IN BIBLE TIMES.\97The divine Healer is present in the sick-room; He hears every word of the prayers offered to Him in the simplicity of true faith. His disciples today are to pray for the sick, as verily as did the disciples of old. And there will be recoveries; for \93the prayer of faith shall save the sick.\94(Gospel Workers, 215.)
